1: rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur <mistake>ro//rgyal</mistake> po dang chom <mistake>kun</mistake> dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur <mistake>ro/ /rgud</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> dang dbul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad <mistake>'byung</mistake> bar mi 'gyur <mistake>ro// mi</mistake> <mistake>sngags</mistake> pa <mistake>dang/</mistake>
2: skur <mistake>pa</mistake> 'debs pa <mistake>dang/smod</mistake> pa <mistake>dang/mi</mistake> snyan <mistake>padang/grags</mistake> pa <mistake>nan</mistake> pa'i 'jigs <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>'byung</mistake> bar mi 'gyur <mistake>ro//skye</mistake> ba bzang po dang rigs dang rus phun sum tshogs par <mistake>'byung</mistake> bar 'gyur <mistake>ro//kun</mistake>
3: nas mdzes par gyur pa <mistake>dang/gzugs</mistake> <mistake>dad</mistake> kha dog dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro // 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug pa <mistake>dang/ying</mistake> la 'bab <mistake>ba</mistake> <mistake>dang/'grogs</mistake> na mchog tu bde <mistake>b</mistake> <mistake>dang/mhog</mistake> na
4: dga' bar 'gyur <mistake>ro//'jig</mistake> rten pa rnams kyi mdzes pa dang / skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa <mistake>dang/tshig</mistake> gzung bar bya bar 'gyur <mistake>ro//gang</mistake> dang gang du <mistake>ske</mistake> bar 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur <mistake>ngo//</mistake>
5: longs <mistake>sbyong</mistake> che ba <mistake>dang/ 'khor</mistake> mang <mistake>zdang/ long</mistake> spyod mi zad ba <mistake>dang/ 'khor</mistake> mi <mistake>zdpar</mistake> 'gyur <mistake>ro//sems</mistake> <mistake>tcan</mistake> <mistake>zams</mistake> cad kyi mchog tu <mistake>gur</mistake> pa'i smon lam dang <mistake>yi</mistake> shes dang yang dag par ldan par <mistake>'dgyur</mistake> ro //
6: rang bzhin gyis kyang <mistake>pa</mistake> rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang yang dag par <mistake>lda</mistake> par 'gyur <mistake>ro//tshangs</mistake> pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par 'gyur <mistake>ro//dan</mistake> pa dang shes bzhin dang / thabs dang sto bas dang smon lam
7: dang ye shes <mistake>dngyang</mistake> <mistake>dga</mistake> bar ldan bar 'gyur <mistake>ro//bstan</mistake> bcos thams cad la <mistake>djigs</mistake> pa med pa <mistake>dang/sprumkhas</mistake> par <mistake>ang</mistake> <mistake>hu</mistake> <mistake>ro//tsheg</mistake> gsal ba dang blun po <mistake>mo</mistake> yin <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>dang/ blo</mistake> gsal bar 'gyur <mistake>ro//</mistake>
8: mkhas pa dang le lo med pa <mistake>dang/ chog</mistake> shes pa <mistake>dang/don</mistake> che <mistake>b</mistake> <mistake>dang/ sred</mistake> pa <mistake>sed</mistake> par 'gyur <mistake>ro//sems</mistake> can thams <mistake>yang</mistake> <mistake>byi</mistake> <mistake>mthog</mistake> tu yid brtan par bya ba <mistake>dang/slob</mistake> dpon <mistake>dang/ bla</mistake> <mistake>mabkur</mistake> <mistake>bard</mistake> bya par
